content: 1 purlwise with yarn in front slip 1 stitch from left needle to right needle as if to purl with yarn in front sm slip marker ssk slip slip knit left leaning decrease slip the first stich on the left needle to the right needle knitwise slip knitwise the next stitch too slip both stitches back to the left needle and knit them together through the back loop sts stitches ws wrong side yo yarn over numbers in between brackets at the end of the round indicate the total number of stitches you should have on your needles once you finish that round * repeat from * to * 3 | urederra socks instructions cuff round 13 * k1 k2tog k2 yo k1 p2 * repeat from * to * cast on 56 64 72 stitches using the round 15 * k2tog k2 yo k2 p2 * twisted german cast on divide the repeat from * to * stitches between the 2 needles with 28 32 36 sts each needle join to remember to work round 16 knit in the round for the magic loop technique being careful not keep working rounds 1-16 until the to twist your stitches place de leg measures 15 cm / 6 inches or marker i recommend placing the you desired lenght from the co marker between the first and second border take note of which round of stitch so it won´t fall chart you ended with to resume after the heel round 1 * k2 p2 * repeat from * to * until the end of the round heel flap repeat round 1 until you have 5 cm turn your work we´ll now work the / 2 inches or you desired length from heel flap on the next 28 32 35 sts the co border en n2 we´ll work back and forth in row the sts on n1 will remain on leg hold round 1 k to end of round row 1 ws sl1wyif p27 31 35 turn charted instruction row 2 rs *sl1wyib k1* repeat from * to * until the end of the row work row 1-16 fron the chart turn included at the end of the pattern row 3 ws sl1wyif p27 31 35 turn  written instructions repeat last 2 row 12 14 16 time round 1 * k6 p2 * repeat from * to * more round 2 and all even-numebered heel turn rounds up to round 16 * k6 p2 * repeat from * to * row 1 rs sl1wyib k16 18 20 ssk round 3 * yo k2 ssk k2 p2 * repeat pm k1 leave the rest of the sts on from * to * hold turn round 5 * k1 yo k2 ssk k1 p2 * row 2 ws sl1wyif sm p7 7 7 repeat from * to * p2tog pm p1 leave the rest of the sts on hold turn round 7 * k2 yo k2 ssk p2 * repeat from * to *
